name: __EMoviePlaybackType
doc:
In order for a platform to support early movie playback, the platform must support the rendering thread
starting very early and support rendering as soon as it is started and the module containing the movie streamer for the platform must already be loaded

MT_Normal: Normal playback mode.  Play each movie in the play list a single time
MT_Looped: Looped playback mode.  Play all movies in the play list in order then start over until manually canceled
MT_LoadingLoop: Alternate Looped mode.  Play all of the movies in the play list and loop just the last movie until loading is finished.
